title: NFL Draft Day 3 Reaction: Notable Picks plus Full Draft Superlatives (Football 4/25)
description:
The most unique draft in NFL history is now over. Will Brinson and Chris Trapasso are here to recap Day 3 and take a glance at the 2020 Draft as a whole. It wasn't a pick, but rather a trade that generated early headlines, as the Redskins finally parted ways with Trent Williams, dealing the offensive tackle to the 49ers. The guys also discuss the quarterbacks taken and other notable selections on Saturday. Next, Will and Chris hand out superlatives taking a look at the best/worst overall classes, overrated/underrated hauls and much more.

'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox, Bullhorn and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @ChrisTrapasso
Check out the Pick Six Instagram page https://www.instagram.com/picksixpod/?hl=en
Join our Facebook group https://www.facebook.com/groups/758548147935545/

To hear more from the CBS Sports Podcast Network, visit https://www.cbssports.com/podcasts/
